discourse_list.title: Stats on the State of Maker 03 - Crossing 2 Billion Dai!

content.content: Thanks for checking out this weekly update on the state and growth of Maker!  Highlights There is now over 2 billion Dai in circulation!  Dai Dai Price: $0.997121 Circulating Dai / Debt Ceiling / Utilization: 2,070,395,659 / 2,442,855,539 / 84.75% Total Collateral / Collateralization: 6,567,061,229 / 317.18%  Daily Active Addresses1908×686 101 KB  Source  Vaults Open Vaults: 20,930 Liquidations (Feb 6 - 12): 8 Total Value: 53,200  MKR MKR Supply: 995,691 MKR Staked (Total / % of Supply): 32,345 / 3.24% MKR Voting (Total / % of Supply): 32,132 / 3.22% MKR Burned (Total / Total Supply): 4,308 / 100,000,000 Surplus Buffer (Now / To burn MKR / est’d time): 7,253,825 / 2,749,724 / 18.11 days Annual Burn (estimated): 21,580 MKR  Governance Executive Votes (Past week): 2 View Votes Governance Polls (Past week): 10 View Polls  More Stats? Constructive feedback is appreciated!
